| name = Haptophytes image = Coccolithus pelagicus.jpg image_width = 250px
| image_caption = Coccolithophore ([[Coccolithus pelagicus]]) domain = Eukaryota
| regnum = Chromalveolata divisio = 'Haptophyta' divisio_authority = Hibberd
| 1976 subdivision_ranks = Classes & Orders subdivision =
Class Pavlovophyceae :Pavlovales Class Prymnesiophyceae :Prymnesiales
:Phaeocystales :Isochrysidales :Coccolithales }} The 'haptophytes', classified
either as the 'Prymnesiophyta' or 'Haptophyta', are a division of algae.

The term "Haptophyceae" is sometimes used. |pmid=18830665
|doi=10.1007/s10126-008-9147-0}} This ending implies classification at a
lower level. However, although the phylogenetics of this group has become much
more understood in recent years, there remains some dispute over which taxon
level is most appropriate.
